# groq-rag

> Extended Groq TypeScript SDK with RAG, web browsing, and agent capabilities - 100% groq-sdk API compatible

## Overview

groq-rag extends the official Groq TypeScript SDK (groq-sdk) with:
- RAG (Retrieval-Augmented Generation) with document chunking and retrieval
- Web search (DuckDuckGo, Brave, Serper)
- URL fetching and content extraction
- ReAct-style AI agents with tool use
- Content limiting to control token usage

## Installation

```bash
npm install groq-rag
# or from GitHub Packages
npm install @mithun50/groq-rag --registry=https://npm.pkg.github.com
```

## Quick Start

```typescript
import Groq from 'groq-rag';

const client = new Groq({ apiKey: 'your-api-key' });

// Standard Groq SDK usage (100% compatible)
const response = await client.chat.completions.create({
  model: 'llama-3.3-70b-versatile',
  messages: [{ role: 'user', content: 'Hello!' }]
});

// RAG with documents
const ragResponse = await client.chat.completions.createWithRetrieval({
  model: 'llama-3.3-70b-versatile',
  messages: [{ role: 'user', content: 'What is the refund policy?' }],
  documents: ['Your refund policy document here...'],
  retrievalOptions: { maxChunks: 3 }
});

// Web search augmented
const webResponse = await client.chat.completions.createWithSearch({
  model: 'llama-3.3-70b-versatile',
  messages: [{ role: 'user', content: 'Latest news about TypeScript?' }],
  searchOptions: { maxResults: 5 }
});

// URL content augmented
const urlResponse = await client.chat.completions.createWithUrl({
  model: 'llama-3.3-70b-versatile',
  messages: [{ role: 'user', content: 'Summarize this page' }],
  url: 'https://example.com/article'
});

// AI Agent with tools
const agent = client.agents.create({
  model: 'llama-3.3-70b-versatile',
  tools: ['web_search', 'url_fetch', 'calculator'],
  maxIterations: 5
});
const result = await agent.run('Research and summarize AI trends');
```

## Content Limiting (Token Control)

```typescript
// Limit web search content
const response = await client.chat.completions.createWithSearch({
  model: 'llama-3.3-70b-versatile',
  messages: [{ role: 'user', content: 'Query' }],
  searchOptions: {
    maxResults: 5,
    maxSnippetLength: 200,      // Max chars per snippet
    maxTotalContentLength: 2000 // Max total chars
  }
});

// Limit URL fetch content
const response = await client.chat.completions.createWithUrl({
  model: 'llama-3.3-70b-versatile',
  messages: [{ role: 'user', content: 'Summarize' }],
  url: 'https://example.com',
  fetchOptions: {
    maxContentLength: 5000, // Max chars
    maxTokens: 1000         // Estimated token limit (~4 chars/token)
  }
});
```

## Supported Models

All Groq models are supported:
- llama-3.3-70b-versatile
- llama-3.1-8b-instant
- llama-3.2-90b-vision-preview
- mixtral-8x7b-32768
- gemma2-9b-it
- And all other Groq models

## API Reference

### Client Methods
- `chat.completions.create()` - Standard Groq chat completion
- `chat.completions.createWithRetrieval()` - RAG with documents
- `chat.completions.createWithSearch()` - Web search augmented
- `chat.completions.createWithUrl()` - URL content augmented

### Agent Methods
- `agents.create()` - Create a ReAct agent
- `agent.run()` - Execute agent with a task

### Built-in Tools
- `web_search` - Search the web
- `url_fetch` - Fetch and parse URL content
- `calculator` - Basic math operations
- `retrieval` - Document retrieval
